mapper.insert: insert into mission (mission_id, mission_type_id, mission_title, mission_describe, pictures, people_count, place, start_time, end_time, publish_time, user_id, order_id, view_count, leave_message) values (#{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missionDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leaveMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
